RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH:
I received the PhD, the MArch and the BEng from Politecnico di Torino, both cum Laude. From 2008 to 2010 I researched in Italy, at Politecnico di Torino; from 2010 to 2011 in Brazil, at Universidade Estadual de Campinas; from 2012 to 2013 in Scotland, at University of Strathclyde, in 2014 Visiting Professr at Universidade Federal de Santa Catarina, from 2015 to 2018 I was the Head of Urban Environment at Erasmus University Rotterdam. Currently I am an Asst Professor tenure track at Politecnico di Torino, Asst Professor at Erasmus University Rotterdam, and Honorary Research Fellow at the University of Birmingham
My interests include Post-carbon Cities, Human Geography, Urban Theories and Models, Quality of Life, Complexity, Urban History, Urban Economics, Future Cities and societies.
I directly studied megacities, cities, villages, environments and societies during around 5 years in Europe, America and Australia.
https://sites.google.com/site/lucadaccicv/
